      • getUserVote

        public int getUserVote(long userId,
                       Article article)
        This method searches the voters list of a certain article for a certain user and returns their vote or -2 if they were not found. (-2 because -1 is an option for a vote)
        Parameters:
        userId - userId
        article - article
        Returns:
        vote or -2 if not found

        article - article
        Returns:
